name: patchmon
description: PatchMon is a self-hosted solution for patch management for small IT teams. It helps track available updates, automate installations, and manage system patching schedules through a clean web UI.
features: Update tracking: Monitor available system updates across multiple servers and workstations from centralized dashboard
Automated patching: Schedule and automate patch installations during maintenance windows to reduce manual intervention
Patch scheduling: Configure maintenance windows and deployment schedules to control when updates are applied to systems
System inventory: Track installed software, versions, and patch status across infrastructure for compliance reporting
Compliance reporting: Generate reports on patch status and compliance levels to meet security and regulatory requirements
Rollback support: Revert problematic patches to previous versions if updates cause issues or compatibility problems
Multi-OS support: Manage patches across different operating systems including Linux distributions from single interface
Notification system: Receive alerts for critical updates, failed installations, or systems requiring attention
Approval workflows: Require manual approval for specific patches before deployment to maintain control over critical systems
Web dashboard: Clean web interface provides overview of patch status, pending updates, and system health at a glance
